issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

The app is very simple, I create 2 tabs and when the window of a tab is opened, I show an "ActivityIndicator", once all data is loaded, I hide the "ActivityIndicator"

And this works great in all devices except Xperia (x10 mini with android 2.1)

In xperia the activityIndicator is null

https://gist.github.com/807418

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Pass object between windows in Xperia fails

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the time passed and lack of progress since the opening of the ticket. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
